resources.string: This app is in developement.\nYou can do signup, login, logout at this time.\nEnjoy......

This mobile application eases up your journey on highways. It is a highway traveler’s app which is free and easy to use on your road trips.
 			We are offering you information of everything that comes across you on a highway.Our aim is to make highway sector more organized and easier.It helps traveler’s travel from their source to destination by connecting through major Indian highways to have a delightful travel experience.
 			It is all in one app for a complete road trip.Now Indian highway travelers can find everything nearby them easily and all with the tap of a button.We are providing you hassle free access to the various areas on highway routes.
